# Breath Weapon Crossfire
## Overview
***The following spells are available to [[Draaki|draaki]] spellcasters at the discretion of GMs.***

**Level**: 1st
#Spell-Level/1st

**School**: Transmutation
#Spell-School/Transmutation

**Casting Time**: 1 action (see text)

**Range**: 30 feet

**Components**: V, S, M (volcanic ash)

**Duration**: 1 round

## Effects
When you cast this spell, you must use your [[Draaki Heritage|draaki breath weapon]] as part of the casting of this spell, beginning to coordinate a relentless crossfire of [[Draaki Breath|draaki breaths]]. Your [[Draaki Heritage|draaki breath weapon]] follows all the usual rules for [[Draaki Heritage|draaki breath weapons]].

Any creatures in squares targeted by your breath weapon who are then subject to another [[Draaki Heritage|draaki breath weapon]] before the duration of the spell has elapsed, suffer from disadvantage to the saves of any subsequent [[Draaki Heritage|draaki breath weapons]] for the duration of spell has elapsed.
